register.reg_long_name: Activity Monitors Count Enable Clear Register 0

purpose_text.para: Disable control bits for the architected activity monitors event counters, AMEVCNTR0<n>.

field_description.para: This field is reserved for additional architected activity monitor event counters, which Arm might define in a future version of the Activity Monitors architecture.
Activity monitor event counter disable bit for AMEVCNTR0<n>.

note.para: AMCGCR.CG0NC identifies the number of architected activity monitor event counters. In an implementation that includes , the number of architected activity monitor event counters is 4.

field_description.para: Possible values of each bit are:

field_value_description.para: When read, means that AMEVCNTR0<n> is disabled. When written, has no effect.
When read, means that AMEVCNTR0<n> is enabled. When written, disables AMEVCNTR0<n>.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
